channel.title: Data Visualization on Maximuming At The Peak
channel.description: Recent content in Data Visualization on Maximuming At The Peak

item.title: The Train Schedule
item.description: This website needs content. I don’t really know what to write at the moment so I’m going to just start with a simple recreation of a 137 year old data visualization to get things rolling. I could have chosen to write about Napoleon’s infamous march but plenty of people write about that already. I recently purchased a copy of https://www.amazon.co.uk/Visual-Display-Quantitative-Information/dp/0961392142 by Edward Tufte. The cover image is a photo of E.
